duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate Four-Car Carriers to support local and national towing operations.
Assist in Catastrophe Response during events like hurricane, hail, and flooding.
Support increased volume and doubled piece rate pay while deployed.
Utilize state-of-the-art towing app and dispatch technology for efficient runs.
Conduct local pick-up and delivery of vehicles to designated Copart facility.
Load/unload vehicles safely and free of damage.
Operate company equipment in compliance with safety regulations.
Deploy to catastrophe events within 24 hours and maintain good operating condition of equipment.
Perform other tasks as assigned by the manager in support of daily auctions.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 1 year towing and/or securement experience
